Name: Skyratz
About the game: Take to the air as one of six unique heroes and soar through Avion City as you perform tricky maneuvers, hunt for powerful weapons and armor, and sortie in the skies to claim your spot on the pecking order! Skyratz seeks to combine old-school flight combat with modern multiplayer action offering an experience that is both distinct and exhilarating! As you battle your foes in mid-air dogfights, youâ€™ll learn more about Avion City and its cast of heroes and villains, ensuring each match will be rewarding and full of surprises! UPDATED April 2022: - Survival Mode! - Mac Version Available - Full Controller Support
